item.description:
Join Us for the Latest Warren Miller Film!!!

I know itmay be a bit of a drive but you can MORE Discount Ski Tickets than Massachusetts Theatres.

We will meet at Flatbreads at 7:00 pm around the corner for drinks and socializing then hit the Show at 9:00

Tickets are $26.00 SHow Starts at 9:00 PLEASE GET YOUR TICKETS IN ADVANCE

This fall, immerse yourself in the Flow State with Warren Miller Entertainment's 63rd film and experience the ultimate winter from a lens of absolute clarity. Warren Miller’s Flow State is a place of such singular focus and connection with the environment that, in this place, the faster you ride, the slower time passes. The Flow State exists anywhere crisp winter air shocks your lungs and sunlight refracts off snowflakes, allowing you to emerge from this state improved – happier, more confident and more aware of your surroundings. So buckle up, because Warren Miller’s 63rd annual ski and snowboard film will take you into the zone…the moment…the groove…the center…the Flow State

FREE ticket to SUGAR BUSH

2 for 1 SUNDAY RIVER

2 for 1 GUNSTOCK

2 for 1 SUGAR LOAF

(see tickets for dates and more info)

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Warren Miller Film "Flow State"
